title: Banana Oat Pancakes
directions: Put the rolled oats, cottage cheese, eggs, cinnamon, vanilla extract and chopped banana into a food processor and blend until the mixture is smooth.
Heat a nonstick frying pan over medium heat.
Pour spoonfuls of batter until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with nuts, a drizzle of honey and extra banana.
ingredients: Nuts of your choice (I love Pecans or Walnuts with this recipe!)
